text: Eurelectric and Energy-intensive industries call for an ambitious and comprehensive EU Industrial Strategy to enable industry’s contribution to the EU long-term GHG goals The EPBD revision: An occasion to unleash the potential of thermal mass for electricity grid flexibility with benefits for the environment and households Call for a joint effort across the value chains - CEMBUREAU reaction paper to the European Commission’s strategic long-term vision “A Clean Planet for all” The EPBD revision: An occasion to unleash the potential of thermal mass for electricity grid flexibility with benefits for the environment and households Consortium of European and global trade bodies publishes peer-reviewed study on the Global Warming Potential assessment of biobased construction products
